originalText.text: I feel very fortunate to have found Dr. Aronson. She is very thorough, explains issues and answers my questions clearly. She also works well with another of my doctors where my medical issues coincide. Dr. Aronson is a kind and sensitive doctor, to me a crucial quality.  She has always made me feel comfortable and respected. I don't hesitate to recommend her.

originalText.text: My Pulmonologist Dr Aronson is such a great Doctor . She is a great listener to everything I have to say ! Make good suggestions and let me know upfront what the whole process and treatment will be. Extremely Thorough! I’m very happy she is my Pulmonologist and she can be yours too . In my book she is the Best! I highly recommend her  !!!

originalText.text:
Dr. Aronson is an excellent physician.
She’s personable and compassionate.
She listens carefully is thoughtful and her examination is very thorough. The amount of time she spends with you is perfect. I’m grateful to have her as my Pulmonologist.

originalText.text: Dr. Aronson is the best. She’s unbelievably thorough and worries about her patients.  She’s really smart! She answers every question, and I leave feeling positive. She’s not an alarmist, and I really appreciate her.

text.text: Dr. Aronson is the best. She’s unbelievably thorough and worries about her patients.  She’s really smart! She answers every question, and I leave feeling positive. She’s not an alarmist, and I really appreciate her.

originalText.text:
I liked Dr. Aronson,
She was very nice, listen to me carefully and explained all my problems very understandingly. She has positive energy, and she is knowledgeable. I strongly recommend Dr. Aronson to other patients.
